item.title: 50% Off Wayfair Promo Code & Coupons | April 2025
item.description: Save 50% with Wayfair promo codes, plus free shipping, 80% off furniture with early Way Day 2025 deals, and more on WIRED.

item.title: He Bought a Racetrack 6 Years Ago. Now He Runs the Netflix of Grassroots Motorsports
item.description: FRDM+ provides access to an impressive library of automotive videos for $20 a month.

item.title: NASA’s Perseverance Rover Finds Strange Rocks on Mars
item.description: A rock containing many smaller round stones could indicate that there was once a large amount of liquid water on the Red Planet.

item.title: The 9 Best Wine Glasses for Every Kind of Wine (2025)
item.description: Upgrading your wine glass game is a window into the finer things in life. These are our WIRED-tested favorites.

item.title: The Meta Trial Shows the Dangers of Selling Out
item.description: Several founders of hot startups took big payouts and let Mark Zuckerberg gobble up their companies—and came to regret it.
